channel.title: Pythons on Puneet's Notes On Data & Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Pythons on Puneet's Notes On Data & Software Engineering

item.title: Load a JSON
item.description: import pandas as pd #Set JSON filepath json_filepath = "data/load_json_example.json" #default is 'columns' df = pd.read_json(json_filepath, orient="columns") df .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } user_name identifier first_name last_name 0 booker12 9012.0 Rachel Booker 1 grey07 2070.0 Laura Grey 2 johnson81 4081.

item.title: Load a CSV
item.description: # Import Pandas import pandas as pd #Load CSV file into a dataframe with Pandas df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv') #Output Dataframe df .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } user_name identifier first_name last_name 0 booker12 9012 Rachel Booker 1 grey07 2070 Laura Grey 2 johnson81 4081 Craig Johnson 3 jenkins46 9346 Mary Jenkins 4 smith79 5079 Jamie Smith # Load a csv file with no headers df = pd.

item.title: Load a CSV
item.description: # Import Pandas import pandas as pd #Load CSV file into a dataframe with Pandas df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv') #Output Dataframe df # Load a csv file with no headers df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', header=None) df # Load a csv file with encoding - UTF-8 df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', encoding='UTF-8') df # Load a csv file with specific column names df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', names=['Username', 'ID', 'First Name', 'Last Name']) df # Write dataframe to csv df.
